column4: could somebody tell me why my integrated bluetooth and wireless card on my HP Pavilion stopped working, and bluetooth even crashed my laptop when i was using windows xp, and now that i'm using ubuntu, they all work perfectly. Could this be somekinda clever software scheme from microsoft to make people buy new laptops, my laptop is 2 years old now.
to you fortune windows and linux have very little in common. That behaviour isn't surprising or new.
whatever it is, it's not related to ubuntu, and hence to this channel
